TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TransactionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TransactionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TransactionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定可供屬性化物件使用的交易類型。

span.span: Specifies the type of transaction that is available to the attributed object.

summary.span: 允許值為 列舉型別的成員。

span.span: Permissible values are members of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性指定交易類型，它不能變更 COM + 目錄中。If a transaction type is specified with this attribute, it must not be changed in the COM+ catalog. 如果 COM + 目錄中變更交易類型，就必須指定相同的交易類型上使用這個屬性的元件。If the transaction type is changed in the COM+ catalog, the same transaction type must be specified on the component with this attribute. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`TransactionAttribute`標示為交易式。The following code example demonstrates the use of the `TransactionAttribute` to mark a as transactional. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CPP/transaction.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/CS/transaction.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Transaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Transaction/VB/transaction.vb#1)]
